mapper.select: select * from board where bd_type = #{type} and bd_del = 'N' order by bd_num desc
select * from board where bd_num = #{bd_num} and bd_del = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into board( bd_title, bd_content, bd_reg_date, bd_type, bd_me_id, bd_ori_num, bd_del ) select #{board.bd_title}, #{board.bd_content}, now(), #{board.bd_type}, #{board.bd_me_id}, ifnull(max(bd_num),0)+1, 'N' from board;
mapper.update: update board set bd_title = #{board.bd_title}, bd_content = #{board.bd_content}, bd_up_date = now() where bd_num = #{board.bd_num}
update board set bd_del = "Y", bd_del_date = now() where bd_num = #{bd_num}
mapper.insert: insert into file(fi_ori_name, fi_name, fi_bd_num) values(#{file.fi_ori_name}, #{file.fi_name}, #{file.fi_bd_num})
